CustomField.description: This field auto changes to PRICED when Dept App is Approved, Price List Correct, Other Product Qty is zero, Mgt App is <> to Rejected, Pricing Notes is blank, Opp name does not start with RS, amount <> to blank or zero.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field semi-auto populates - see the Description on this field. NOT PRICED = either a spreadsheet customer, or one not to be invoiced through Salesforce currently, or to be priced by Accounts. PRICED = prices are correct.
CustomField.label: Priced
